PATIENT_ID: TEST_BD_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-21 06:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-21 06:15:00
Category I trauma activation for 35-year-old male involved in high-speed MVC.
Trauma activation level: Category 1.
Primary survey completed. Patient hemodynamically unstable on arrival.
BP 90/60, HR 125, GCS 14.
Massive transfusion protocol initiated.

[LAB] 2026-01-21 06:20:00
ABG drawn at 06:18.
ARTERIAL BLOOD GAS RESULTS:
pH: 7.28
pCO2: 32 mmHg
pO2: 95 mmHg
Base deficit: -6.2 mEq/L
HCO3: 18 mEq/L
Lactate: 4.1 mmol/L
Base deficit on initial admission blood gas consistent with hemorrhagic shock.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-21 06:45:00
ABG results reviewed. Base deficit of -6.2 consistent with Class III hemorrhage.
Continuing resuscitation with blood products.
